metadata.title: CVE-2021-23239 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The sudoedit personality of Sudo before 1.9.5 may allow a local unprivileged user to perform arbitrary directory-existence tests by winning a sudo_edit.c race condition in replacing a user-controlled directory by a symlink to an arbitrary path.

criterions.comment: sudo package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4p2-2ubuntu2').
